name: VAR Dynamics
tag_list: saas, microsoft-exchange, dynamics-crm, e-mail, hosted, msp, smb, reseller, var, sharepoint, zimbra, tendigits, mobile-access, compliance-archiving, email-encryption
overview:
VAR Dynamics (VDI) is a Tier One provider of enterprise-class, private label hosting services to partners in 12 countries around the world. VDI sells exclusively through reseller channels.

VAR Dynamics’ suite of hosted services are architected from the ground up to serve the needs of channel partners, and include hosted Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Microsoft Sharepoint, RIM BlackBerry, Zimbra, secure messaging and much more.

VAR Dynamicsâ€™ Partner Program is designed to enable VARs, Systems Integrators, and other resellers to market a full complement of value-added hosted services to their customers with speed, agility, and no upfront investment, thus reducing risk and capturing new high-margin revenue streams. VAR Dynamics is a privately-held, next-generation company headquartered in San Jose, California with offices in Florida and Washington. www.vardynamics.com
